caption: This is clearly one of the most attractive restaurants in the region. Whenever I come to this place I am very satisfied. They always keep their high  level service and the highest level of dishes  they give. You definitely will enjoy this this restaurant. Very  recommended.
This spot is great and roomy, the food was enchanting and the rates were very economical. quickly, efficient service and very personal staff members. I recommend this place.
I honestly liked their food and customer service, awesome location next to my house. The workers are always very nice. Will come back again.
Beautiful coffee spot with great art gallery inside! Cozy atmosphere and lovely staff!
Cool location to meet with coworkers. Had a friend come into town and she asked me to take her here again. The place has a great atmosphere.
We enjoyed the atmosphere and food!  Bread was a little dry, but still good! We ordered the coffee cake, it was a huge serving for a low price.
Beautiful hidden coffeehouse with an amazing art gallery inside. Definitely a must visit in Miami! Superb menu and signature cocktails.
Amazing food

Try the lavender milk tea omg it's so goooood.  They make the drinks super fast too.  Love the ambiance and their selection in music.  Usually you need to valet but when you come at a off time, you can self park and save few bucks. :)

I dine in this nice place often! This is my favorite place to eat.  I visit this place at least once a month. The meals are great, the team is helpful and the payment is good. I enjoy going in this spot for a rich dinner.

I like to go with friends to this place with my highest recommendations. I visit this place often. This recommendation is always successful. The dishes they serve are yummy and the team is attentive and cooperative. always when we visit this place we enjoy a splendid time.  I recommend this place with pleasure.

I visit this outstanding place often  as I love the ambiance that is exist in this place. The crew is exceptionally attentive and experienced. The service is extremely rapid. Not to mention, the food they prepare is exceptionaly good. I ate …
Fantastic food, service and atmosphere
I love this place!

We love this place! Every time we travel to Miami this restaurant is a must. The food is exceptional and is always fresh. The servers are very sweet and super accommodating. We always see the same faces, which means its a around great all around business. We love La Muse and will always come in to eat when we are in town.

(Translated by Google) The best brunch in Miami! Exquisite cuisine, in an ideal environment; the best: the service, thanks to Eduardo for such kind treatment. Best brunch in Miami! Exquisite cook, ideal atmosphere; the best thing: service, …
Seafood salad is very nice!
Best food, nice staff, consistently fantastic ambience. They charge convenient rates and the food quality is great. Keep it up.
The service is always fast, fantastic atmosphere, very kind employees. I will come back again when I arrive in the area.

Such a nice little cafe located in Brickell! I had no idea it was on the first floor of the Epic hotel (which is where Area 31 is) This eclectic spot is half cafe half art gallery! Which makes for a cool scene and ambience when you eat …
Tried this spot already with my friend and I am addicted ever since. I love the excellent ambience and flavorful dishes and beverages. Great work.
Slow service, terrible food

(Translated by Google) I recommend booking, especially on weekends. The place is very nice and cozy and you can enjoy its art gallery and enjoy a delicious brunch at the same time. I liked the food and they also have delicious cocktails. …
Excellent service! Waiting staff was so nice and the management is superb!
It was close by the time i got there im not sure if its all the weekend thet they close early or 5 pm

Right at the Kimpton Epic hotel, this little cafe has excellent espresso drinks and well crafted food. Portions are a little small, but the Buddah Bowl I had was delish, every single bite. Nice enclosed patio or you can sit in the gallery which has some impressive art.

(Translated by Google) An indescribably beautiful place, for art lovers an option that should not be missed! Very careful attention and a great atmosphere! A not-so-extensive and quite expensive menu, small portions and medium quality. An …
Extremely good food, good place ,the portions may be small but it's worth it because it always meets expectations
Awesome food and service by Jose Penso!! Loved this place.
Lovely place! Food was amazing and their customer service is outstanding!

One of the best views for an artistic view vibe with healthy yet expensive food options. This place has a huge love for smoked salmon and I'm alll about that. However, I wish our server,Oscar was more friendly and better at communicating …

Very chic European place, next to a modern art gallery. It is reasonably priced, and the meals are quite fresh and tasty!  The outdoor section includes a plant-filled patio, while the inside is part of the art gallery itself; the art and …
Dinner was wonderful. Rodney, the manager on duty was very accommodating and made me feel at home. Highly recommend!

LaMuse is a fun, vibrant cafe in a modest but charming art gallery. The comfortably shaded terrace seating is packed with thoughtful, whimsical design touches that are sure to charm if you plan to visit with a small (<4) group.  Vegan …
Lovely atmosphere! Very chic and delicious meal. Our servers were also great and gave good recommendations for my first time here. Make sure to enjoy the gallery afterwards.

Not even worth 1 star. Place looked intriguing so we stopped in for brunch whilst waiting for our room at the Epic. It took 10 minutes to be sat at a table when no one else was waiting. Staff seemed short-handed.  Server took our drink …

(Translated by Google) Delicious and high quality food. Nice service. Had quiche and two salads and the strudel. Everything lovingly prepared and also a feast for the eyes.  (Original) Sehr leckeres und qualitativ hochwertiges Essen. Netter …
Absolutley fantastic breakfast, this place is a gallery, great food plus amazing paintings make an exellent combination.

(Translated by Google) Delicious!!!! A restaurant rich for lunch or breakfast, beautiful interior gallery and incredible attention !! Thanks to Eduardo; p all spectacular !!  (Original) Delicioso!!!! Un restaurante rico para almorzar o …

(Translated by Google) The best attention, the best place! Eduardo a love ... Excellent SUPER recommended! ;)  (Original) La mejor atención, el mejor lugar ! Eduardo un amor ... Excelente SÚPER recomendado ! ;)

(Translated by Google) Excellent my experience, the food is a dream, the place is beautiful in all its angles and the service made everything unforgettable, especially thanks to Eduardo Penso, his recommendations were 100% The best. …
Euduardo was amazing! Burratta was glorious. Will come back for brunch.
I love the food and the service was amazing.

La Muse has an atmosphere that will blow you away. Great service, they took care of our entire party of 12 on last second notice. We came in with out suitcases and they put us on the front porch! Highly recommend this place. The food was good.

really cool spot with good service and quality food/drinks. we got the tuna melt and crab(or was it lobster?) quiche and they were both delicious. also order two of their punch cocktails and those were very refreshing. a ton of really cool artwork. highly recommend!
Great food, good ambiance as well! Art gallery+brunch place! Love ot

If you are looking for a memorable meal in a beautiful place, look no further than La Muse. The atmosphere, service, and food are flawless whether you are looking to impress or be impressed. And while the Buddha Bowl is a favorite, the …
I eat in this spot a lot since I work close by. I have to say their service is always awesome and they keep the spot clean at all times. Pricing is convenient and they serve generous portions.
I had an extraordinary experience at this restaurant. We liked the awesome vibes and the food. The staff members were super amiable. I am glad we ultimately managed to visit this spot.
The question is why this place ?

(Translated by Google) A beautiful cafe in downtown. Apart from being able to have a drink, it is an art gallery with a lot of charm, the service is very good, Eduardo is very attentive and being the first time we came he has explained …
Great food, excellent service. A must for brunch when youre in Miami

I absolutely love this cafe/It is one of my favorite places I bring guests to from in town. Everything from the food to the gallery is an artistic and culinary experience like no other in Downtown. Art freaks and foodies will for sure love …
The restaurant is very artsy!!!

I’m all about restaurant experiences, and this place delivers on the experience side. The decor is great, from the outside patio to the inside cafe. Well decorated and cool (plastics) plants.  I’m giving La Muse 2 stars for three reasons: …

Lovely place with very modern art and good food. A bit pricey, though. And they brought a plain croissant instead of the multigrain one that the menu stated. I guess I’m more sort of angry at myself for not complaining.
This place is great! Fair pricing, large portions and the staff members are always very friendly.
One of my favorite places to grab something to eat. fantastic location, well kept, and excellent service. Highly recommended!
This place clearly knows how to please their clients. Regularly with a friendly mindset. The food is affordably priced, always delicious and neat.

Food was okay nothing extra..the service was horrible I don’t think I’ve ever experienced anything this bad! We asked for a specific table the girl tells us to walk around while she cleans it and she’ll come to get us. 10 minutes later …

The décor sets a wonderful tone for you with colors and textures abounding. I enjoyed a great Bloody Mary with my breakfast on the terrace. The service was attentive and very good. The natural light flowing through the flowers decorating …
Would surely recommend eating here. Excellent atmosphere, delicious food, good service. Highly recommended.

La Muse café is an art inspired breakfast and lunch spot inside the EPIC hotel downtown Miami. Located street side, this hidden gem can be easily missed, look for the beautiful stain glass murals and you'll know you've arrived! Once inside, …
Would certainly recommend visiting this place. Fantastic character, flavorful dishes, excellent service. I recommend this place.
Great place to grab some food when in a hurry. The service is speedy, prices are fair, great character. I highly recommend this spot.
I tried this place before with my friend and I am obsessed since then. I love the good ambience and delicious food and beverages. Fantastic work.

We were delighted with LaMuse Cafe from the menu to the art to the al fresco brunching.  We ordered Audrey Bowls (smoked salmon, fingerling potatoes, avocado and cage free eggs) and delightful hot mango ginger tea. Everything was served and …

Great brunch place in a beautiful art gallery! This is the kind of place you think of when you want an Instagram brunch. Thankfully, the food was delicious for the expected price point of being in downtown Miami. Highly recommend the tea …

(Translated by Google) A rich experience of art and food! Excellent service, we were served by Oscar 👏🏻 5 stars for the  (Original) Una rica experiencia de arte y de comida ! Excelente servicio , fuimos atendidas por Oscar 👏🏻 5 estrellas para el

I was there a few Months ago when visiting my brother. We had such a great time as the food is beautiful, the ambiance and music volume level is completely appropiate. And the staff really on point. Oscar was very and properly attamptive making sure nothing was missing. Definetely coming back..
Beautiful place and great tasty food! Oscar our server was so nice and very attentive. This is a must on every trip to Miami ✨
The place is nice but the service is terrible , it takes more than 20 minutes to get at table that are empty ... then the server takes a while to get your order ... highly prices for a cheap service
Staying across the street at the marriott and decided to try this place out. Really nice atomosphere and food. Our waiter Yuri was great. would come again to try breakfast.
Yuri has been an excellent host! Food tastes great!

Love this place!! Really healthy spot, quaint, & artsy chill vibes. Yuri was our server, really kind guy, very informative, easygoing, and funny. Service and food was all around great! Definitely would come back to see him and get another healthy bite!
Cutest little cafe! Loved the vibe and Yuri was a great waiter!
Absolutely amazing! Food is fantastic and the service... Flawless! Oscar and Liz are so nice and gave us a 5star reception! A MUST GO WHEN IN MIAMI!

This place it’s amazing!! Loved the decoration and the white wall with the faces, very artistic, customer service was above and beyond by Oscar G (he the best). I had the Audrey bowl that was like a little salad bowl with poached eggs and I …

(Translated by Google) Excellent service, food and art with the decoration of the beyond! Spectacular!! Thanks @theartroute for the recommendation and thanks Oscar for the good service we received!  (Original) Excelente atención, comida y …

Right from moment you enter La Muse you are transported to an artsy museum. It is the cutest place and instagrammable spot. But the most important factor is the food. The food is so tasty and the avocado toast with poached eggs on top were …

LOVE THIS PLACE!!!!!!  Hats off to Yuri for exceptional service during our visit.  What a beautiful setting.  Decor is superbly beautiful.  Sat in the outdoor terrace.  Awwww, Miami winters unlike any other.  The food..........speechless.   A must visit!!!!!❤
I love this place, an amazing context to a wonderful meal! I seriously love the decoration of this place and also Yuri’s good attitude and services! I definitely come back!
Best crepes in town, cozy little place

Good food and service. Sat on patio and it would have been hard for anything to have been better.  It was one of those places we kind of stumbled in to and we had 0 regrets afterwards.  It was a perfect setting for a nice quiet lunch.

Horrible service! Took over 20 minutes to get our drinks. When they brought them we were missing 4 of our drinks. It took another 25 minutes to get the rest of our drinks. Extremely expensive for the portion of food given. Waiter did not follow up to check on how we were doing. Do not recommend.
Great food, slow service! I suggest you go early, specially on the weekends.
Good food in an art gallery. The service is excellent and really helpful. Sandwiches are amazing as well as the salads.
Such a neat space. The food also delicious. I had the paradise platter which was almost too pretty to eat. My brother enjoyed the ham and cheese crosub. Would definitely go again.
Amazing Food and great service

Really unique place! We came down for the CrossFit Comp at Bayfront Park and decided to eat a late breakfast here on Sunday. Service was good until the food started to really drag out. Party of six food took over an hour. Coffee took at …
It took forever to bring a horrible cold ham and cheese croissant. Hot chocolate taste like old coffee. Service is so slow.
Went there for lunch and enjoyed it
Cozy place to have brunch or light lunch. Nice decor and gallery. Super friendly staff

If you are going to charge $15.00 for a mimosa I expect to have it served in a flute and also know the brand. For such steep price I would expect real champgne such as Veuve Clicot. Everything on the menue is over priced for what it s …

I would highly recommend La Muse Cafe! Art & Food, the best of Miami in one place! Service was top notch & the food amazing! I will be returning & passing it on to friends & family, this is definitely a place to go in Miami for a delightful experience!
We loved the service there, our waiter was very friendly and polite. The food was alright, but not amazing.
Nice environment but the service was not perfect..the food tasted good and not pricy
Very nice place. Unacceptable waiting time. It took forever to get such basic things like capuccino and croissant.
Amazing food, great service! A must experience!
Awesome experience, food and gallery.  The food is creative just like the art, the ambient both inside and out are perfect, nothing fancy.  Service is great.
Beautiful place. The avocado toast was amazing but the açaí bowl not so good, they have to put more smoothie and less granola.
(Translated by Google) Delicious place with a super nice atmosphere with integrated gallery  (Original) Delicioso lugar con un ambiente super agradable con galería integrada

Unique decoration, peculiar food, a special location, put it on your radar.  What do you get when you combine art and food? La Muse café offers the two environments; one that can be found inside of Avant Gallery and one outdoors, they both …

Exceptional tea, Tea Forte brand served. Great upscale menu. Best egg muffin I ever had. Exceptional apple tart, real apple and light dough. Agradable ambiance with comfortable chairs. Only downside was the  noise on week days due to …

“Curiouser and Curiouser” I became of this place... and I finally had the opportunity to come! Came to a surprise when I arrived that it was attached to the fabulous “Avant Gallery” that I always wanted to go to! 2 for 1 already on my mind …
Great vibe and yummy food - always love an early morning breakfast here before it gets crowded.

Started out on the poor side with seating.  Sat others ahead of us even though we were at the hostess stand.  Offered us outdoor dining but then told us the outdoor was full.  Those issues aside.  Wow.  The food was superb.  The portions …
AMAZING food and the best service. Delicious coffe and desserts too. The good thing about this place is the amazing atmosphere and the art galery right next to it.
(Translated by Google) Very poor menu. Great service.  (Original) Muy pobre el menú.  Buen servicio.
Excellent food, great music, the sandwiches are amazing and the attention is perfect, Oscar the venezuelan guy is a good server.
One of those best place for breakfast and enjoy the art painting

I went there today to have lunch and the food was AMAZING!!! Loooved the Poched egg croissant. The decoration and Art is to die for! Wanted to take a thousand pictures!!! Everyone was so nice, the Server Oscar was super kind and …
The eating experience! A must-see place in Miami

Awesome new new cafe close to my house with sooo delicious salmon tartines and açaí bowl, I like the way how they serve food in original cups and plates. Also one of the most beautiful things that I can enjoy the food and watching at art pieces at the same time.
Great place for brunch! Food is delicious!
Loved it here! And the food? I'm OMG, delicious. Also great service
Good food and service
Incredible spot!  Great atmosphere to relax and unwind.  Yummy food, great coffee, awesome service!
Used to love this place. New staff is not good. Had to ask to be attended . Food and atmosphere is great. If you are into narcisistic instagram pics I recommend this place.

Absolutely fabulous and keep as a secret of mine  ! It is my favorite place to go every morning and grab a light and nutritious breakfast and lunch ! The service is amazing love the people there ! The place overall is like no other, soo …
The food is a work of art. Great concept delicious meal.
Amazing
Food was good but very tiny portions at high price.
Love this place. Perfect for meetings or getting some work done, but also great for a nice brunch with friends. Love all of their croissant sandwiches!
Absurdly slow service in a pretty setting. They did send over a free dessert when we complained about the wait but an hour for a couple of egg mayonnaise sandwiches was ridiculous!
(Translated by Google) Sophisticated  (Original) Sofisticado
Came here for breakfast. Really nice place and decor. Very good service and menu, though a little pricey for the portion sizes
Lamuse was amazing!
My favorite cafe in Miami! Great coffee, food and artsy ambiance 😍

We like this place. Coffee is excellent. The last cup of coffee I was there was special. He has butter [YES, OIL]. I raised a toast ... interesting, but maybe a little hard to drink.  The art gallery is really cool, continental breakfast. …
Really cool, European-style breakfast place inside an art gallery. Great service, excellent food! Prices are a bit on the high side for breakfast but not bad if you know what to expect.

Food was yummy but nothing special (fresh orange juice and lox toast), especially when the service was so bad and the food was overpriced. Yes, a ton of restaurants in the Miami area are overpriced, but usually the quality of the food and …
Delicious food
Restaurant and Art Gallery! On the expensive side for coffee and desserts! Cozy atmosphere for a date!

Artsy, chic, Parisian-inspired menu and decor. Beautifully presented and tasteful food, healthy, natural and just plain good. Had the avocado tartine with poached eggs. Recommend for a breakfast or brucnch that’s not the usual offerings

The Banana & Nutella crepe was hands down the best crepe I've ever eaten in my life. My girlfriend got the Cuban CroSub and she said, "The flavor was on point and the croissant was fresh." Besides the food, the coffee and capaccinuo were …

Absolutely amazing place. Food is fresh and plentiful (I had eggy crosub and it was great). The place itself is marvelously furnished and worth just looking around. Prices are suprisingly reasonable for the quality of the experience.

I can't really give an opinion on the cafe itself other than to say it is nicely decorated & smelled wonderful. We actually went inside to check out the art of a 17yr old artist, Skyler Grey. This guy has talent.
Wonderful service and food, great art, high professional staff.

The prices are a little steep but the food is tasty and the decor is cute. Their wild berry crepe was very tasty and their scramble was adequately cheesy. I recommend going on a week day morning if you can or the wait time can be hefty.
Everyythinnngggggg sooo good.
Awesome avocado toast this morning for breakfast!  Will definitely be back for a multigrain croissant before leaving Miami.
I had the most delicious breakfast at la muse this morning.  My server was very accommodating, and the environment is beautiful.
Awesome!
Dirk was great and the freshly baked croissant were to die for.

We LOVE this place. The coffee is fantastic. The last coffee I had there was the special. It had butter in it [YES, BUTTER]. I dipped my toast in it... Interesting but maybe a little difficult to drink.

Mixed feelings. Excellent location, very unique, though definitely overpriced for what it really offers. Don't really recommend unless you'd like to spend upwards of 30 bucks between 2 food items and 2 espressos.
Really nice!!!
